titles.title: A joint resolution designating Sunday, May 10, 1987, as a Special Day of recognition to the Mothers of the Harlem Community.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 5/6/1987--Introduced. Proclaims May 10, 1987, to be a Special Day of recognition to the Mothers of the Harlem Community.
